Name: Kid Chameleon™
About the game: Heady Metal, the boss of the arcade game Wild Side, has escaped! He’s capturing kids by defeating them at their own game. Take Kid Chameleon into Wild Side and give Heady metal and his gruesome underlings a taste of their own aspirin. Because Kid Chameleon is about to cause a few headaches of his own!

Meta Description: Looking for information on Kid Chameleon™? Check out the release date (Sep 13, 2010), developer insights from SEGA, and a complete game summary.
